Alteration 5

Transmute Fire
Ritual
F2
spell id [id]: 645
effect number [effect_number]: 117
damage [damage]: 2016
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 1F
Alchemize Gems:20++ ?
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The alchemist transmutes fire gems into gold. Every extra gem spent gives the alchemist several pounds of gold. Skilled mages produce even more gold.
Gold gained: 20 gold per gem spent after the initial cost (increased by two for every extra mage level).
